name.japanese: ロングリングロングランド

description: An archipelago consisting of ten islands arranged in a ring shape, connected by land bridges that surface once a year. The island is characterized by its elongated flora and fauna, and serves as the location for the Davy Back Fight between the Straw Hat Pirates and the Foxy Pirates.

keyEvents.title: Final Stretch of Donut Race
keyEvents.description: The race around Long Ring Long Land reaches its climax with the final three boats competing.
keyEvents.significance: The location serves as the race course for the first event of the Davy Back Fight.

keyEvents.title: Foxy Reveals Noro Noro no Mi
keyEvents.description: Foxy uses his Devil Fruit powers during the race around the island.
keyEvents.significance: The location witnesses the first use of the Noro Noro no Mi in the anime.

keyEvents.title: Groggy Ring Rules Explained
keyEvents.description: The rules for the second Davy Back Fight event are explained on the island.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the next event that will take place on the island.

trivia: The island's unique geography where land bridges surface once a year causes the annual Aqua Laguna tidal wave at Water 7 due to massive water displacement
Everything on the island is elongated in shape, including the animals and vegetation
The archipelago consists of ten islands connected in a ring formation
